author: Natalia Lusinski
title: These rainbow cheesecake slices will make you want to wash your mouth out with soap
text:
These rainbow cheesecake slices will make you want to wash your mouth out with soap Before you get ready to dig into this dessert, think again. These rainbow cheesecake slices will make you want to wash your mouth out with soap, so to speak, according to Cosmopolitan . Yup, sadly, they‚Äôre not edible. Soooo, the good news?! They‚Äôre healthy! Soap Cherie makes them from ingredients such as coconut oil and shea butter, so they‚Äôre probably waaaay better for your skin than actual desserts. But, like actual desserts, there are many ‚Äúflavors‚Äù to choose from. Purple, pink, blue ‚Äî yes, all your unicorn-colored dreams come true‚Ä¶in a ‚Äúslice‚Äù of soap . For ~actual~ unicorn cheesecake, you may remember this recipe , btw.
But back to the matter at hand, and Soap Cherie‚Äôs ‚Äúcheesecake‚Äù varieties. Warning: You may want to have some actual edible cheesecake on hand, because this will make you crave some.
All we can say rn is: YUM. #delicious soap #icecream #fresh #natural #soapcherie #brooklyn #moisturize #vegan #cleancosmetics
